metadata.title: CVE-2016-3922 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libril/RilSapSocket.cpp in Telephony in Android 6.x before 2016-10-01 and7.0 before 2016-10-01 relies on variable-length arrays, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug30202619.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
